message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $8,500 is too low for me. Could you do $9,000?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,800?
